chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem.
Thank you for your help,

If the seller receives the package, he has 3 workdays (5 workdays for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the article, or 2 workdays to make a refund if this is possible.
The customer has met the following requirements for a successful return:
✔ He confirms that the device has not been opened by a third person nor damaged (through fall or water exposure).
✔ He has a return label.
✔ He knows that all accessories and the receipt must be attached to the package.
✔ He knows that the package must arrive at your location within 14 days.

Don't forget: As soon as the package arrives, sellers have 3 workdays to repair or replace the product (5 workdays for laptops and household appliances), respectively, or 2 workdays to make a refund.

Dear ecomobile

The customer has cancelled the order.

Can you please stop the dispatch and initiate the refund?

Thank you very much.

Regards,
Luciana from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The order has been successfully cancelled and the customer has been refunded.

Regards,
JY
